    #include<iostream>
    #include<algorithm>
    using namespace std;
     
    int main()
    {
    int n,testcases,i,j,k,l,min,secondmin,third,a[3];
    long long count;
     
    cin>>testcases;
    for(i=0;i<testcases;i++)
    {
    cin>>n>>a[0]>>a[1]>>a[2];
    sort(a,a+2);
    min=a[0];
    secondmin=a[1];
    third=a[2];
    count=0;
    for(j=0;j<=min;j++)
    {
    for(k=0;k<=secondmin;k++)
    {
    if((n-j-k)>=third)
    count+=third+1;
    else if((n-j-k)>=0)
    count+=n-j-k+1;
    }
    }
    cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
    }
